cause.description:
The communist Democrat party will be challenging the Republican party of freedom in the year 2008. Not only is the US in danger of being destroyed from within, but the Islamo-fascists of the Middle East, South Eastern Europe, North Africa, and Asian Minor threaten the US in the ultimate battle of cultures.
Donations go to Veterans of the War on Terror as well as previous wars.
1. Democrats under any name must not be allowed into office in order to ensure success of the War on Terror
2. Nations of the West must acknowledge the war is a War on Terror and not one of.
3. The Islamic extremist must not be allowed to enjoy anymore victories.
cause.mission: Eliminate socialism in the US and defeat fascism abroad
cause.name: Re-defeat Fascism and Communism
